scripts.build: npm -w backend run build && npm -w client run build
scripts.lint: npm -w backend run lint && npm -w client run lint
scripts.test:e2e: npm -w client run build && playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:mock: npm -w client run build && playwright test --config=playwright.config.js
scripts.test:e2e:local-api: npm -w client run build && playwright test --config=playwright.local-api.config.js
